reviews.text:
I was visiting during happy hour on 1/2 off wing Wednesday with friends. 

I ordered a peach cider and spicy garlic cauliflower "wings". For $2 off draft...

We ate breakfast at Bodega twice while on our trip to Ohio from Los Angeles and loved it!

The staff is very friendly, the food is tasty, and they have...
Bodega is a long-ish standing watering hole in the Short North-- I believe they were formerly known for dollar grilled cheese, which is now $2 grilled...
